quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Family Matters and Friends
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, cookies, profession. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Where did the Winslows live on the popular television show Family Matters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chicago

questions.question: In an episode of Friends, we learn that when Ross was 4 years old, he made his father cry by doing what?

options.text: He washed his Porsche with rocks.
He drove the Porsche out of the garage and crashed it.
He told him he didnt love him.
He cut up his favourite suit.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He washed his Porsche with rocks.

questions.question: What year did the popular television show Family Matters leave the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1998

questions.question: What is the name of the nanny  Rachels had as a child In the popular sitcom Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mrs. K

questions.question: How many episodes of the show Friends are there altogether from its start on September 22, 1994, to the last episode on May 6, 2004?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 236

questions.question: In one of the episodes of Friends, how many cookies must Ross sell, so that Sarah can go to space camp? Shes already sold 75.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 400

questions.question: How many children did the Winslow family have in the TV series Family Matters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: In the TV series Family Matters, Steve and the Winslow family flew to Paris on which of Steves inventions?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Urk - Pad

questions.question: Which of these is not one of the numerous songs Phoebe wrote throughout the ten seasons of Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Smelly Car

questions.question: What was the name of Eddie Winslows best friend on the popular television show Family Matters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Waldo

questions.question: What was the name of the debonair boy that Steve created in Family Matters in order to get Laura to like him?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stefan Urquelle

questions.question: Family Matters was a spin-off from the hit 80s television show Perfect Strangers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: There comes a point in Friends where Chandler is desperately trying to break up with his girlfriend Janice. What address does Chandler tell Janice to write to when he tells her he was going away?

options.text: He didnt give her an address
The Grand Hotel of Yemen, Rm5, Yemen

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 15 Yemen Road, Yemen

questions.question: What year did the popular television show Family Matters first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1989

questions.question: What was Carl Winslows profession on the sitcom Family Matters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Police Officer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Atlantic City

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Central Perk

questions.question: Ursula, an extremely forgetful waitress on Mad About You worked at what bar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Riffs

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jims Marios

questions.question: Several of the Seinfeld plots hatched in the booth of which restaurant often frequented by Jerry, George, Elaine and Kramer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Monks Cafe

questions.question: Who was the first to propose to Phoebe in Season 9 of  Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mike

questions.question: What is the name of the local restaurant where the characters on Threes Company meet for a few drinks?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Regal Beagle

questions.question: The surgeon of M*A*S*H could be found drinking at this establishment close to the camp.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rosies Bar

questions.question: Fred Flintstone and Barney Rubble of The Flintstones were members of what club?

options.text: Loyal Order of Water Buffaloes Lodge

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Loyal Order of Water Buffaloes Lodge

questions.question: What was the favorite after-school hangout for the students in Happy Days?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arnolds

questions.question: On the animated sitcom Family Guy, Peter Griffin and his buddies can be found at which bar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Drunken Clam

questions.question: Archie Bunker, a character on All in the Family would frequent this local bar, which he later bought and renamed Archie Bunkers Place.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kelcys Bar

questions.question: What year did the show The Partridge Family make its debut on television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1970

questions.question: In the popular sitcom Friends, Phoebes half brother Frank likes doing what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melting stuff

questions.question: The FYI team on Murphy Brown often had lunch at this bar.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phils

questions.question: In the sitcom Full House, Pams death occurred in the middle of the first season.

questions.question: In the popular American television sitcom Full House, who was the best friend of the eldest daughter D.J.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kimmy Gibbler

questions.question: In Full House, we could see Pam Tanner only once in a home video that Danny recorded the day when Michelle was brought home from the hospital.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was the name of the manager of the Partridge family on the self-titled 70s hit television show?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Susan Dey

questions.question: In Full House, initially D.J.s boyfriend was referred to as Steve Peters. Later on in the series, his name was changed into what?

questions.question: Who played the mother Shirley partridge on the 70s television show, The Partridge Family?

questions.question: Shirley Jones and David Cassidy were the only band members who actually sang on the TV series, The Partridge Family.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which actor played the role of Chris Partridge from 1970 to 1971, on the show The Partridge Family?

questions.question: In the  American television sitcom Full House, who was Pam Tanner?

questions.question: In the pilot episode of Full House, where did D.J. move to when Jesse moved in and she was obliged to share a room with Stephanie?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cut it out!

questions.question: Who were Michelles first best friends in the Full House series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Teddy and Denise

questions.question: In the sitcom Full House, this actor played Steve, D.J.s cousin, but was the actress brother in real life.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kirk Cameron

questions.question: In the sitcom Full House, Stephanie had many different friends since kindergarten, but she never had a really  good friend until she met whom in DiMaggio Junior High?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gia

questions.question: In the sitcom Full House, when Jesse went skiing with his friends and Danny told  D.J. and Stephanie that he had left and would probably not return, they became very sad. What plan did they make up to get him back?

options.text: To call him and tell him Danny was dying
To call him and announce Danny was getting married
To call him and tell him that Machelle was sick
To call him and beg him to come back

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To call him and tell him that Machelle was sick

questions.question: In the Full House series it was revealed that Jesses first name was actually what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hermes

questions.question: In the sitcom Full House, Stephanie loved one of her toys best. What was its name?

questions.question: On the TV show Full House, Stavros was what kind of relative to Jesse?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His cousin

questions.question: What was Dannys middle name on the show Full House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ernest

questions.question: What song was played in the Full House series, after Jesse got a phone call from the girls while he was gone skiing?

options.text: Will You Still Love Me Tomorrow
Stop In the Name of Love

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baby Love

questions.question: What was Jesses popular catchphrase on the show Full House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Have Mercy!

questions.question: On Full House, once D.J. wanted badly to have an autograph from her favourite singer and pretended to be sick in order to skip school and get it. Who was that singer?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stacy Q

questions.question: In an episode of the Full House series, when Jesse, Joey, and Stephanie caught the chicken pox, who stayed home to look after Michelle so she wouldnt get it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: D.J.
